sentences.en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentences.cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentences.en: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.cn: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

sentences.en: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.cn: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.en: CBS's ratings again showed huge improvement over the previous year.
sentences.cn: 与前一年相比，哥伦比亚广播公司的收视率再次大幅提高。

sentences.en: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
sentences.cn: 努力过，失败过，没关系，屡战屡败，屡败屡战，每一次失败都比上一次更好。

sentences.en: He once again raised his baton and brought in the brass.
sentences.cn: 他再次举起指挥棒，让铜管乐部加入进来。

sentences.en: He skimmed the pages quickly, then read them again more carefully.
sentences.cn: 他先快速地浏览页面，然后再细细阅读。

sentences.en: He'd only gone a few paces before he stopped again.
sentences.cn: 他只走了几步远就又停了下来。

sentences.en: I also met with Pollack again to kind of shoot the bull.
sentences.cn: 我也再次和波拉克会面，两人闲聊了会儿。

sentences.en: I tried again to get ahold of my cousin Joan.
sentences.cn: 我再次尝试联系我的表妹琼。

sentences.en: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.cn: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.en: If he is caught again he will be given a custodial sentence.
sentences.cn: 如果他再次被捕，将会被处以监禁。

sentences.en: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.cn: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.en: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.cn: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.en: Northbridge is a cool, calculating and clever criminal who could strike again.
sentences.cn: 诺思布里奇是个头脑冷静、诡计多端、阴险狡诈的罪犯，他可能还会犯案。

sentences.en: Once again, Drew was under arrest.
sentences.cn: 德鲁再一次被拘捕。

sentences.en: Rachel burst out as the door was flung open again.
sentences.cn: 当门被再次猛地推开时，雷切尔冲了出去。

sentences.en: She started once again on the steep upward climb.
sentences.cn: 她又开始沿着陡峭的山路往上爬。

sentences.en: The envelope has been tampered with and then taped shut again.
sentences.cn: 信封被人动过手脚，然后又用胶带封上了。

sentences.en: There can be little doubt that he will offend again.
sentences.cn: 毋庸置疑他还会再犯的。

sentences.en: We were expecting him home again any day now.
sentences.cn: 我们期盼着他某一天再回家。

phrases.tran_cn: 拒绝再玩，不再；再也不会
adv. 一再地；反复不断地
一次又一次；多次，不断地

trans.tran_en: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

trans.tran_cn: 还，再一次，还原，同样地，而且，再说一遍
trans.tran_en: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before
